oai_dc:dc.dc:descriptions: Death of the narrator’s first wife, which was foretold by springbok and gemsbok. By Dia!kwãin (L V.-9. 4653-4688).

An account of what the springbok did when Dia!kwain's first wife (Mietje) died. Ssu-!kui-ten-tta points out that he had told Dia!kwain that the actions of the game foretold what was happening at home.
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: What the springbok and the gemsbok did when they knew that Dia!kwain's wife would die
